proposed_strategy.name: Validated Group by Character Count
proposed_strategy.description: The entire document (Śāntipāṭha and Adhyāya 1 with commentary) is combined into a single chunk, as the total character count is well below the safety limit.

execution_plan.description: Prefatory material (Śāntipāṭha, Maṅgalācaraṇam) and the entire First Chapter (Prathamo 'dhyāya) with the Prakāśikā commentary.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Adhyāya is divided into smaller, numbered units (Mantra/Verse), which serve as the primary semantic unit for parsing and indexing the text and its associated commentary.

start_pattern.description: A new Mantra (verse) starts with its text, immediately followed by the verse number enclosed in double vertical bars.

end_pattern.description: The unit ends just before the start of the next Mantra's number marker, or at the explicit chapter conclusion marker.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: The initial material including 'शान्तिपाठः', 'मङ्गलाचरणम्', and 'आचार्यवन्दनम्' should be treated as a single 'Prefatory' section before the content of the first numbered Mantra (॥ १ ॥).
